description: This is a comprehensive source file for a Flutter-based notes app, including models, services, and UI screens for listing, viewing, editing, and managing notes, integrated with Supabase for backend data storage.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: A data model class representing a Note with properties like id, title, content, createdAt, and updatedAt, including methods for mapping from and to Map structures.

classes.name: NotesService
classes.description: A service class encapsulating Supabase database interactions for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting notes.

classes.name: NotesApp
classes.description: The root widget of the Flutter app, setting the theme and home screen.

classes.name: NotesListScreen
classes.description: The main screen displaying a list of notes, with search, refresh, and navigation to view, edit, or add notes.

classes.name: NoteViewerScreen
classes.description: A screen for viewing a specific note's details, with options to edit or duplicate the note.

classes.name: NoteEditScreen
classes.description: A screen facilitating creation or editing of notes with a form interface.

methods.name: fetchNotes
methods.description: Fetches list of notes from Supabase, optionally filtered by a search query.

methods.name: fetchNoteById
methods.description: Fetches a single note by its ID from Supabase.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note in the database with specified title and content.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note in the database.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note based on its ID.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Initializes Flutter bindings, loads environment variables, initializes Supabase, and runs the NotesApp.
